tool_description: Searches and retrieves comparable M&A transactions based on industry, size, timing, and deal characteristics for transaction-based valuation multiples.

industry_focus.description: Industry sectors to search for transactions

enterprise_value_min.description: Minimum enterprise value in millions USD

enterprise_value_max.description: Maximum enterprise value in millions USD

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be earlier than end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
No transactions found: Adjust search criteria as no transactions match the specified parameters.
Invalid deal types: Use supported deal types like 'acquisition', 'merger', 'buyout', 'spin-off'.
Database access error: Unable to connect to transaction database, try again later.
usage: Specify industry_focus, transaction date range, and optionally filter by enterprise value and deal types. Returns comparable transactions with key deal metrics.
